languages.text: "Технические коридоры простираются на сотни метров в разные стороны. Немезит и его люди должны быть знакомы с туннелями, у них есть карта или проводник. У блюстителей же без четкого следа велик шанс заблудиться и потратить драгоценное время. А в узких коридорах для врага, поджидающего в засаде, они станут легкой мишенью".

"The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."
languages.original_text: "Технические коридоры простираются на сотни метров в разные стороны. Немезит и его люди должны быть знакомы с туннелями, у них есть карта или проводник. У блюстителей же без четкого следа велик шанс заблудиться и потратить драгоценное время. А в узких коридорах для врага, поджидающего в засаде, они станут легкой мишенью".

traits.locale_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and either have a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers have a good chance of getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

"The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and either have a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers have a good chance of getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

"The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

"The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

"The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

"The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

languages.text: "Die technischen Korridore erstrecken sich Hunderte von Metern in verschiedene Richtungen. Nemesit und seine Männer müssen mit den Tunneln vertraut sein und haben entweder eine Karte oder einen Ortskundigen. Ohne klare Spur riskieren die Enforcer, sich zu verirren und wertvolle Zeit zu verlieren, ganz zu schweigen davon, dass diese engen Tunnel ideal für einen Hinterhalt sind."
languages.original_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

traits.locale_text: "Die technischen Korridore erstrecken sich Hunderte von Metern in verschiedene Richtungen. Nemesit und seine Männer müssen mit den Tunneln vertraut sein und haben entweder eine Karte oder einen Ortskundigen. Ohne klare Spur riskieren die Enforcer, sich zu verirren und wertvolle Zeit zu verlieren, ganz zu schweigen davon, dass diese engen Tunnel ideal für einen Hinterhalt sind."

languages.text: «Los corredores de mantenimiento se extienden cientos de metros en distintas direcciones. Nemesitio y sus hombres han de estar familiarizados con esos túneles; quizá hasta dispongan de un mapa o un guía. Sin un rastro que puedan seguir, los guardias corren el riesgo de perderse y desperdiciar un tiempo muy valioso, por no mencionar el hecho de que esos pasadizos tan angostos son el sitio ideal para una emboscada».
languages.original_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

traits.locale_text: «Los corredores de mantenimiento se extienden cientos de metros en distintas direcciones. Nemesitio y sus hombres han de estar familiarizados con esos túneles; quizá hasta dispongan de un mapa o un guía. Sin un rastro que puedan seguir, los guardias corren el riesgo de perderse y desperdiciar un tiempo muy valioso, por no mencionar el hecho de que esos pasadizos tan angostos son el sitio ideal para una emboscada».

languages.text: 「技術回廊は数百メートルに渡りあちこちに伸びています。ネメサイトとその部下はトンネルに精通しているので、地図があるかガイドがいるはず。明確な道しるべがなければ、エンフォーサー達は道に迷って、貴重な時間を無駄にする危険があります。狭いトンネルが奇襲しやすいことは言うまでもありません」
languages.original_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

traits.locale_text: 「技術回廊は数百メートルに渡りあちこちに伸びています。ネメサイトとその部下はトンネルに精通しているので、地図があるかガイドがいるはず。明確な道しるべがなければ、エンフォーサー達は道に迷って、貴重な時間を無駄にする危険があります。狭いトンネルが奇襲しやすいことは言うまでもありません」

languages.text: “技术回廊向各个方向延伸数百米之远。涅墨斯特和他的手下肯定对隧道非常熟悉，而且还有地图或者向导。相比之下，我们的执法者没有清晰的线索，在探索的过程中很有可能会迷路，浪费宝贵的时间。更不用说，蜿蜒、狭窄的隧道最适合敌人埋伏。”
languages.original_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

traits.locale_text: “技术回廊向各个方向延伸数百米之远。涅墨斯特和他的手下肯定对隧道非常熟悉，而且还有地图或者向导。相比之下，我们的执法者没有清晰的线索，在探索的过程中很有可能会迷路，浪费宝贵的时间。更不用说，蜿蜒、狭窄的隧道最适合敌人埋伏。”

languages.text: « Les galeries techniques s'étendent sur des centaines de mètres dans toutes les directions. Némésite et ses hommes doivent bien connaître ces tunnels et posséder une carte ou un guide. Sans piste claire, les prévôts risquent de s'égarer et de perdre un temps précieux, sans parler du fait que ces passages étroits sont parfaits pour une embuscade. »
languages.original_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."

traits.locale_text: « Les galeries techniques s'étendent sur des centaines de mètres dans toutes les directions. Némésite et ses hommes doivent bien connaître ces tunnels et posséder une carte ou un guide. Sans piste claire, les prévôts risquent de s'égarer et de perdre un temps précieux, sans parler du fait que ces passages étroits sont parfaits pour une embuscade. »

languages.text: "Teknik koridorları, farklı yönlere doğru yüzlerce metre uzunluktadır. Nemezit ile takipçileri, tünellere aşina olsa gerek. Muhtemelen haritaları ya da kılavuzları var. Net bir iz olmadan infazcıları göndermemiz risk taşıyor. Kaybolup kıymetli vakitlerini boşa harcayabilirler. O dar tünellerin pusu kurmak için harika olduğu hususuna girmiyorum bile."
languages.original_text: "The technical corridors extend hundreds of meters in different directions. Nemesite and his men must be familiar with the tunnels and possess either a map or a guide. Without a clear trail, the enforcers risk getting lost and wasting valuable time, not to mention the fact that those narrow tunnels are perfect for an ambush."
